# Aufgabe

Importieren Sie den Datensatz `mariokart` in R.
Berechnen Sie den mittleren Verkaufspreis (`total_pr`)!

Hinweise:

- Runden Sie auf 1 Dezimalstelle.



</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>

# Lösung

Pakete starten:


::: {.cell hash='mariokart-mean1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_36b0c2342b504c2766da38c0546b80a4'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(easystats)
```
:::



Daten importieren:


::: {.cell hash='mariokart-mean1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_9c7492f216e62a93c864f4c7bc7d23dc'}

```{.r .cell-code}
d_url <- "https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/csv/openintro/mariokart.csv"
d <- data_read(d_url)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='mariokart-mean1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_a84a8196ac118425be1c8509f231bafe'}

```{.r .cell-code}
d  %>% 
  summarise(pr_mean = mean(total_pr))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
   pr_mean
1 49.88049
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='mariokart-mean1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_99f1d74b5eb5c54c07eb4ef9290c0923'}

:::


**Lösung:** 49.88.
